tr.td: Element `Substance.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.instance` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.instance`, but has no comparisons.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Substance.status`: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/artifact-status`. Element `Substance.status` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.status`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.category` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.category`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.code` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.code`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.description` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.description`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.expiry` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.instance.expiry`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.quantity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.instance.quantity`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Substance.ingredient` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Substance.ingredient.quantity` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Substance.ingredient.quantity` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.quantity`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Substance.ingredient` requires a cross-version extension. Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`. Element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Substance.ingredient.substance[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.

div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Substance|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

The context is moved up to parent element `Substance.ingredient`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Substance to FHIR R4 Substance
